basics.name: Terrance Gallaher Jr
basics.label: Graphic Designer/Web Developer
basics.summary: My name is Terrance Gallaher Jr. I come from a small town outside of Spokane, WA known as Wellpinit. I study Visual Communication Design at Eastern Washington University and I have a minor in art along with a certificate in User Experience Design. I enjoy meeting new people and I am always ready to conquer any challenges presented to me. I'm also a quick study and learning new things comes easy to me. For more information about what my work experience has been and some awards I've won, please look below.

work.summary: The summer youth program was a work program for the youth of the Spokane tribe. It was offered every summer to students and younger people from around the Spokane City area. The work revolved around landscaping and taking care of public events that happened during the summer.
highlights: - Aided the elderly in cleaning their yards and maintaining their housing.
- Took care of the public areas around the reservation; this includes swimming areas around the rivers, and the pow wow grounds around the town.
- Learned how to work with motorized equipment to help with landscaping.

work.summary: The work at Spoko Fuels revolved around mostly cashier work, but that was not the limit of the things one would do. Work there pertains to anything related to a gas stations maintenance as well. I worked with propane, customers, handled daily paperwork, and covered custodial jobs as well.
highlights: - Certified to work with propane and to handle the propane tanks.
- Paperwork covering the total cashflow the tills go through, throughout the day.

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: I've been on the dean's list more than once for multiple different quarters, this means that my GPA was higher than a 3.5 for the overall quarter. For questions about this, please ask.

publications.name: Advertisement Bumper for SPACED
publications.summary: Made in my motion Design Class, this was an animated bumper for a made up company called SPACED.

publications.name: Video Reel for highlights from Motion Design
publications.summary: This was a video reel that I made from all of the highlights from my motion class. This includes an animation I did, a sound composition, and a animated bumper.

publications.name: SPACED Mobile Application Prototype
publications.summary: This is a prototype that I designed in Sketch, and made a prototype for in inVision
